definitions.definition: A lustration : a ceremonial purification of the people of Rome performed every five years after the census .
Synonym of quinquennium : Any 5 - year period .

main_definition: ( historical ) A lustration : a ceremonial purification of the people of Rome performed every five years after the census . [from late 16th c.]
secondary_definitions: ( by extension , literary ) Synonym of quinquennium : Any 5 - year period .
